name: KNACK!
description: Minimalistic arcade platformer. You are able to move only in one direction, can you get through it?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 125 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 125 MB available space
